channel.title: Integrations on Plakar | The Open Standard for Backup and Restore
channel.description: Recent content in Integrations on Plakar | The Open Standard for Backup and Restore

item.title: Release v1.0.4 — A new milestone for Plakar
item.description: Plakar v1.0.4 introduces pre-packaged binaries, a new plugin system for integrations, smarter caching, policy-based lifecycle management, UI refinements, and major performance boosts — marking a milestone release for the platform.

item.title: Back up Notion? Yes, you can.
item.description: With our new Notion integration, plakar can now snapshot and restore workspaces directly — docs, databases, and more. No hacks. Just data.
